value:
This yukata is so easy to move in, not
to mention nice and cool. But...$k$pDo you happen to know if I'm
wearing it properly?

One day, I hope to hold a festival just
like this in Crimea. One that will bring
everyone together in joy.

What is it that starts war? Perhaps it
all stems from a fear of different
cultures or ways of thinking...

I've never danced a foreign dance
before. Its moves are so unique. But
I'm still not quite getting them right...$k$pWould you mind practicing with me?

My father was troubled endlessly by
how baseless assumptions can lead
to discrimination against other lands.$k$pI'm certain there is a role I can play to
end such atrocities as well...

I come with an invitation to the
summer festival from my lord
$Nf.

It seems my training has borne
fruit. I feel so accomplished!

I think I'm finally getting used to
this dance's motions.

Perhaps I'm still too self-
conscious about this dance...

Thank you for this. I'll do all I can
to help you.

I am Elincia, daughter of King Ramon
of Crimea. Hm? My outfit comes as a
surprise to you?$k$pThis is actually sacred garb for a
festival.

Have you taken time to look upon the
smiling faces of those participating in
the summer festival?$k$pWhat we should fight to protect is not
history or kingdoms but those smiling
citizens.$k$pTaking part in this festival, having the
chance to dance with everyone, has
reaffirmed my resolve to fight.$k$pI know not what storms may come in
the future, but I'll never hesitate to
raise my weapon for my people.$k$pOnce peace has been restored, let's
dance together again. Hand in hand,
my lord $Nu.
それっ！
やっ！
ええっ！？
だめっ！
I must dance!
Watch me dance!
I only learned by watching.
To our friendship!
The last dance...
Um...
The dance of Hoshido!
Let's do our best.
A-one, A-two... Wh-whoa, eek! Oh, I'm so sorry. I tripped over my own feet. This dance is not as easy as it looks...
I have never been a particularly skilled dancer, so I must practice often to make up for that.
This outfit was a gift... It's a symbol of Hoshido's friendship.
If you strive to learn all you can about another kingdom, you are sure to find common ground.
If you have some time... Would you join me for a dance?
Understood.
A festival!
I shall dance.
